name: Amulet of Vitality
description: A gold amulet with a red ruby teardrop at its center.
benefit: Benefit. Your Constitution stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this amulet.

name: Circlet of Wisdom
description: A thin, silver circlet set with a shimmering, blue pearl.
benefit: Benefit. Your Wisdom stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this circlet.

name: Gloves of Agility
description: Thin, leather gloves that seem to meld with the wearer's hands.
benefit: Benefit. Your Dexterity stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing these gloves.

name: Gauntlets of Might
description: Heavy, bronze gauntlets with engravings of Herculean giants.
benefit: Benefit. Your Strength stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing these guantlets.

name: Hat of Intellect
description: A floppy, pointed hat with a wide brim.
benefit: Benefit. Your Intelligence stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this hat.

name: Necklace of Charm
description: A gold, fishbone chain that shimmers with subtle beauty.
benefit: Benefit. Your Charisma stat becomes 18 (+4) while wearing this necklace.

name: Sigil of the Arcane
description: A small emerald decorates this beautiful copper ring.
benefit: Benefit. You fire an additional bolt with the Magic Missile spell.

name: Killer's Work
description: This rusted iron bangle is covered in dried blood.
benefit: Benefit. You deal a critical hit if you roll a 19 or better on an attack roll with daggers.

name: Seal of Faith
description: This thick iron band is dented, scratched, and studded with small pearls.
benefit: Benefit. Add your level to healing done by the Cure Wounds spell.

name: Ring of Toughness
description: A large amethyst decorates this dark iron band.
benefit: Benefit. Your maximum hit points are increased by 4 and you take 1 less damage from physical attacks.

name: Bilestompers
description: The edges of these leather boots show signs of corrosion.
benefit: Benefit. Acid damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Additionally you can walk on acidic surfaces without taking damage.

name: Dead Man Stands
description: These thick leather boots show no sign of wear and tear.
benefit: Benefit. Dying rolls reduced to 15 in order to stablize.

name: Trollhide Belt
description: This belt has been crafted from the mossy hide of a forest troll with intertwined vines and leaves.
benefit: Benefit. Regenerate 1 hit point each round of combat.
additional: Taking acid or fire damage stops the regeneration effect for 10 rounds.

name: Berserker's Belt
description: Multiple strong leather straps with crossed axes as buckles abdorn this belt.
benefit: Benefit. Damage rolls with melee weapons increase by 1.
additional: If hit in combat roll 1d4, on a 4 you enter a frenzy where the damage increases to 2 and your AC is reduced by 2. Frenzy lasts until the end of combat.

name: Mantle of Wreathing Flame
description: This crimson red cloak with golden trim radiates warmth when worn.
benefit: Benefit. Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Physical attacks deal an extra 1d4 fire damage.

name: Cloak of Minor Missiles
description: While this cloak appears mudane, though a slight shimmer of blue and violet hint to something more.
benefit: Benefit. Bows, crossbows, and the Magic Missile spell deal an additional 1 point of damage.

name: Ioun Stone, Garnet
description: A strange gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles garnet.
benefit: Benefit. Attack rolls increase by 1.

name: Ioun Stone, Peridot
description: A strange gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles peridot.
benefit: Benefit. Armor increases by 1.

name: Ioun Stone, Iolite
description: A strange gemstone the size of a pebble that resembles iolite.
benefit: Benefit. Spellcasting checks increase by 1.

name: Flame Tongue
description: A silvery blade that radiates a dull, comforting heat. It errupts into flames when drawn.
benefit: Benefit. Deals an additional 1d4 fire damage.
additional: You can cast Burning Hands once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Frost Brand
description: This dark iron blade is cool to the touch. It freezes the surrounding air when drawn.
benefit: Benefit. Deals an additional 1d4 cold damage.
additional: You can cast Chilling Touch once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Avalanche
description: A dark iron axe that weighs twice that of other axes. Loose pebbles begind to levitate when drawn.
benefit: Benefit. Deals an additional 1d4 acid damage.
additional: You can cast Grease once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Stormcaller
description: This pearl white wooden bow radiates energy. The air crackles with electricity when drawn.
benefit: Benefit. Deals an additional 1d4 electrical damage.
additional: You can cast Shocking Grasp once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Sarenrae's Blessing
description: The surface of the mysterious shield is warm to the touch and grows hotter when tensions rise.
benefit: Benefit. Fire damage is reduced by 3 points.
additional: Enemies within close take 1 point of fire damage per round.

name: Irori's Devotion
description: A large blue crystal surrounded by hardened steel forms a remarkable shield.
benefit: Benefit. Physical damage is reduced by 1 point.
additional: When struck by a critical, you and your allies within near regain 1d4 hit points.

name: Raiment of the Seventh Veil
description: This fine robe has a large symbol made of six dull-colored veils tied end-to-end on the chest.
benefit: Benefit. You're able to see through the effects of the Mirror Image spell.
additional: You can cast Mirror Image once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Rebel's Call
description: With a golden bell emblem on the chest, this reinforced leather armor has heavy wear and tear.
benefit: Benefit. For every ally within half near deal an additional 1 point of damage.
additional: You can cast Shield of Faith once per day (+4 bonus).

name: Iridescent Chainmail
description: This chainmail shifts hues of green, blue, white, and red in the light.
benefit: Benefit. Elemental damage is reduced by 3 points.

name: Plate of Ill Payment
description: This plate mail helps lash out to those who would harm the wearer.
benefit: Benefit. If hit within close you may counter attack once per round.
